formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: MailboxCount Synopsis: Check Mailbox Message Count Privilege: call,all Description: Checks a voicemail account for new messages. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Mailbox: Full mailbox ID <mailbox>@<vm-context> ActionID: Optional ActionID for message matching. Returns number of new and old messages. Message: Mailbox Message Count Mailbox: <mailboxid> NewMessages: <count> OldMessages: <count>

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,12 +1,13 @@ Action: MailboxCount Synopsis: Check Mailbox Message Count - Privilege: call,all + Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Checks a voicemail account for new messages. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Mailbox: Full mailbox ID <mailbox>@<vm-context> ActionID: Optional ActionID for message matching. - Returns number of new and old messages. + Returns number of urgent, new and old messages. Message: Mailbox Message Count Mailbox: <mailboxid> + UrgentMessages: <count> NewMessages: <count> OldMessages: <count>
